Assessment.QuestionText: You want to display a tool tip as <font face="courier new">"Click the button to save the information in the database"</font> for a button using the <font face="courier new">ToolTip</font> class. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
Button btnClick = new Button();
ToolTip tipTextHelp = new ToolTip();
tipTextHelp.ToolTip(btnClick, "Click the button to save the information in the database.");

Button btnClick = new Button();
ToolTip tipTextHelp = new ToolTip();
tipTextHelp.SetToolTip(btnClick, "Click the button to save the information in the database.");

Button btnClick = new Button();
ToolTip tipTextHelp = new ToolTip();
tipTextHelp.SetTip(btnClick, "Click the button to save the information in the database.");

Button btnClick = new Button();
Tooltip tipTextHelp = new Tooltip();
tipTextHelp.SetTip(btnClick, "Click the button to save the information in the database.");

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (B).
